posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Le
Guys,

So frustrated that I got home too late for this ebay auction!  Anyway...if the winner wants to make a quick 20% profit....please shoot me an email:
scottglevy@yahoo.com

Also would love to get one in even better shape ... so if there are any hiding in psa/sgc/bvg 5,6, or 7 please shoot me a line.

Regards.
S

Posted By: mark s.
hey scott-
are you referring to the psa 4 piedmont factory 42 that sold tonite for $2171 delivered?
well, since there are at least ELEVEN other examples owned by board members, i suspect that an open offer of $2600 for a vg-ex specimin should prove fruitful for both buyer and seller!
best wishes in your quest.

Posted By: Scott Levy
Yes....that is the one.  Looking for a medium to nice condition sample of this card.

Regards,
Scott

Posted By: Paul
I have an SGC40 red Cobb factory 42. Please email me at paulgx3@yahoo.com if your interested. I can send scans Wednesday morning.

paulgx3@yahoo.com
